text: Sabe sesibanikeza incwadi njengendlalifa labo esabakhethayo ezincekwini zethu, ngakho-ke phakathi kwabo kunalowo owona umphefumulo wakhe futhi phakathi kwabo kunalowo omaphakathi nendawo futhi phakathi kwabo kunalowo ophambili kunabo bonke ezenzweni ezinhle ngemvume kaMvelinqangi lokho kungumusa omkhulu
